Boxing Stance

Requirement: Unarmed or a weapon with the Unarmed trait.

Twisting your off-hand to your front and sliding your dominant foot backward, you pull your fists in front of your face in a defensive stance and stand on your toes.

Pros

Fist Fighter

  • Your unarmed damage die increases two sizes.

1-2 Punch

  • Unarmed attacks have the “Light” trait.
  • If your unarmed attacks already have the “Light” trait, their damage die increases by one additional size instead.

Jab & Weave

  • If you use the Self-Defense action, you can make an off-hand attack as a minor action.

Counterpunch

  • When an enemy misses you with an attack while in melee range, you can use your reaction to make a special attack against that creature, such as an uppercut or cross-counter. The target must make a Dexterity (Save) check of DC 10 + your Strength Modifier + your Proficiency Bonus. On failure, you hit the target with an unarmed attack that deals +1 additional damage, causing them to stumble and fall @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.RK3DF56CKMQUV6DM]{Prone}. On success, they dodge the attack and they take no damage.
  • For each counterpunch that you land, your adrenaline kicks in, causing your unarmed attacks to deal 1 extra damage die size for the next 1 minute, to a maximum of 2d6.

Cons

Weight Class

  • You have disadvantage to hit creatures of a different size than you.
